name: Rototiller
summary: Raises the Attack and Special Attack stats of all Grass-type Pokemon by one stage. Does not affect Flying-type Pokemon, those with Levitate, holding an Air Balloon, or Pokemon under the effects of Magnet Rise or Telekinesis.
viability: Rototiller is best used in Doubles/Tripes with Grassy Terrain, and with a Grass Pokemon as a partner. The problem is that it simply takes too long to set up, and can ultimately end up harming you before it helps. Use a different boosting move for your Grass-Pokemon instead
